## BammDeposit.totalCollateralInBamm property

Address of frontend through which this Bamm Deposit was made.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly totalCollateralInBamm: Decimal;
```

## Remarks

If the Bamm Deposit was made through a frontend that doesn't tag deposits, this will be the zero-address.
